numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Mali is the lowest point on the graph.
2. Indonesia is the highest point on the graph.
3. I wonder what factors they consider to determine this information.
4. The graph shows that people around me think differently.
5. The graph shows that the lives of people around the world are different.
6. The graph shows the opinions of people around the world.
7. I think that this is interesting.
